name: Computer Conquest
description:
CCQ develop bespoke, high quality, software solutions for the Financial and Engineering sectors.
Prior to working with CCQ, our clients typically struggled with these challenges: Ageing software systems becoming less functional and unproductive, Overnight reports are still not finished by morning bottle-necking workers, Poorly integrated systems resulting in manual processes wasting staff time, and Clients left waiting due to unresponsive / over loaded software systems damaging reputation.
READ MORE...
